thread.title: Twitter Is Going Crazy Over Charlize Theron's Earrings at Oscars - Charlize Theron Chopard Earrings Oscars 2017
thread.title_full: Twitter Is Going Crazy Over Charlize Theron's Earrings at the Oscars - Charlize Theron Chopard Earrings Oscars 2017

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Twitter Is Going Crazy Over Charlize Theron's Earrings at Oscars - Charlize Theron Chopard Earrings Oscars 2017
text:
Charlize Theron is a vision at the Oscars red carpet, in a pleated metallic Dior gown with her hair coiffed into a neat ponytail. But what really got viewers excited were her massive Chopard earrings. The accessory had the the Twitter-verse questioning where she got them, how much they cost, and most importantly, just how exactly she holds them up. See the best reactions below.
Moment of silence for Charlize Theron's ear lobes #Oscars pic.twitter.com/JZZ4jouvBV
— Nicki Garbáge (@heifer_herder) February 27, 2017
